parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Force animation of pylon to given state, -1 for reset to engine handling, can cause weapon inoperative, because weapon is released  when pylon state <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>1. Supports pylon name since Arma 3 v1.93.145594</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''animatePylon''' [pylon, animphase, instant] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [pylon, animphase, instant] : [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] or [[String]] - pylon index (index starts from 1) or pylon name (see [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] Example 4) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> animphase: [[Number]] - animation phase (0...1) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> instant (Optional): [[Boolean]] - animate immediately </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] [1, 0.5];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] ["pylon1", 0.5];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] ["pylon1", 1, [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
